name: The 6th International Conference on Accounting and Financial Management
content: The 6th International Conference on Accounting and Financial Management (AFM 2020) Website：https://www.sepconf.org/conference/AFM2020/ Date: Sep. 18-20, 2020 Venue: Xi’an Grand Dynasty Culture Hotel， Xi’an China Organizer Meeting Link: https://www.academicx.org/ Online Submission: https://www.sepconf.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1278 Email Submission: workshop9@126.com About AFM2020: The 6th International Conference on Accounting and Financial Management (AFM 2020) will be held from September 18 to 20, 2020 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Accounting and Financial Management. The aim of AFM 2020 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods. Publication and Presentation: Publication: All the accepted papers will be published by a peer-reviewed open access journal that can ensure the widest dissemination of your published work. For more information, please contact us (paper\_service@163.com) Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System Participation Methods: Full Paper Submission: Regular Attendance + Paper Publication + Presentation. One author will be invited to make an oral presentation and the paper will be published Abstract Submission: Regular Attendance + Abstract Presentation. Abstract will be accepted and author will be invited to make an oral presentation. Audience Participation: Regular Attendance (No Submission Required) Keynote speakers: 45 minutes theme report Contact Us: Email: workshop9@126.com Tel: +86 15527752170 QQ: 1349406763 WeChat: 3025797047 Topics: Topics of interests for submission include, but are not limited to Accountability and Integrity Accounting Information System Auditing and Assurance Business Model Other related topics
